title: PipelineStructureDesc
description: Outlines the internal structure of a [Pipeline][kiara.pipeline.pipeline.Pipeline].

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: The steps contained in this pipeline, with the 'step_id' as key.

processing_stages.title: Processing Stages
processing_stages.description: The order in which this pipeline has to be processed (basically the dependencies of each step on other steps, if any).

pipeline_input_connections.title: Pipeline Input Connections
pipeline_input_connections.description: The connections of this pipelines input fields. One input field can be connected to one or several step input fields.

pipeline_output_connections.title: Pipeline Output Connections
pipeline_output_connections.description: The connections of this pipelines output fields. Each pipeline output is connected to exactly one step output field.

StepValueAddress.title: StepValueAddress
StepValueAddress.description: Small model to describe the address of a value of a step, within a Pipeline/PipelineStructure.

step_id.title: Step Id
step_id.description: The id of a step within a pipeline.

value_name.title: Value Name
value_name.description: The name of the value (output name or pipeline input name).

sub_value.title: Sub Value
sub_value.description: A reference to a subitem of a value (e.g. column, list item)

PipelineStep.title: PipelineStep
PipelineStep.description: A step within a pipeline-structure, includes information about it's connection(s) and other metadata.

required.title: Required
required.description:
Whether this step is required within the workflow.

In some cases, when none of the pipeline outputs have a required input that connects to a step, then it is not necessary for this step to have been executed, even if it is placed before a step in the execution hierarchy. This also means that the pipeline inputs that are connected to this step might not be required.

processing_stage.title: Processing Stage
processing_stage.description: The stage number this step is executed within the pipeline.

input_links.title: Input Links
input_links.description: The links that connect to inputs of the module.

StepDesc.title: StepDesc
StepDesc.description: Details of a single [PipelineStep][kiara.pipeline.structure.PipelineStep] (which lives within a [Pipeline][kiara.pipeline.pipeline.Pipeline]

processing_stage.title: Processing Stage
processing_stage.description: The processing stage of this step within a Pipeline.

input_connections.title: Input Connections
input_connections.description:
A map that explains what elements connect to this steps inputs. A connection could either be a Pipeline input (indicated by the ``__pipeline__`` token), or another steps output.

Example:
``` json
input_connections: {
    "a": ["__pipeline__.a"],
    "b": ["step_one.a"]
}

```

output_connections.title: Output Connections
output_connections.description: A map that explains what elemnts connect to this steps outputs. A connection could be either a Pipeline output, or another steps input.

required.title: Required
required.description: Whether this step is always required, or potentially could be skipped in case some inputs are not available.

ValueSchema.title: ValueSchema
ValueSchema.description:
The schema of a value.

The schema contains the [ValueType][kiara.data.values.ValueType] of a value, as well as an optional default that
will be used if no user input was given (yet) for a value.

For more complex container types like array, tables, unions etc, types can also be configured with values from the ``type_config`` field.

type_config.title: Type Config
type_config.description: Configuration for the type, in case it's complex.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: Whether this value is required (True), or whether 'None' value is allowed (False).

is_constant.title: Is Constant
is_constant.description: Whether the value is a constant.

doc.title: Doc
doc.description: A description for the value of this input field.

connected_inputs.title: Connected Inputs
connected_inputs.description: The step inputs that are connected to this pipeline input

is_constant.title: Is Constant
is_constant.default: Whether this input is a constant and can't be changed by the user.
